mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_id, user_pass, user_name, user_nick, login_type, user_phone) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName}, #{userNick}, #{loginType}, #{userPhone})
mapper.update: update user SET user_pass = #{userPass}, user_nick = #{userNick} , user_phone = #{userPhone}, update_dt = NOW() WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
